enWisdom: Deeds are the fruits of intentions
Deeds are the fruits of intentions
Intention is the basis of action
The goodness of an action is [gauged] by the righteousness of [its] intention
Uprightness of the exteriors is a symbol of the soundness of the inner consciences

Wisdom: قَدْرُ الرَّجُلِ عَلَى قَدْرِ هِمَّتِهِ وَعَمَلُهُ [عِلْمُهُ‏] عَلَى قَدْرِ نِيَّتِهِ
enWisdom: The value of a man is proportionate to his endeavour and [the value of] his action is to the extent of his intention

Wisdom: كُلُّ حَسَنَةٍ لَا يُرَادُ بِهَا وَجْهُ اللَّهِ تَعَالَى فَعَلَيْهَا قُبْحُ الرِّيَاءِ وَثَمَرَتُهَا قُبْحُ الْجَزَاءِ
enWisdom: Every good deed which is not done with the intention of seeking nearness to Allah, has the ugliness of ostentation in it and its fruit is an ugly requital
Many an action is corrupted by the intention
If the intentions became sincere, the actions would become pure

Wisdom: لَا عَمَلَ لِمَنْ لَا نِيَّةَ لَهُ
enWisdom: He who has no intention has no action

Wisdom: لَا يَكْمُلُ صَالِحُ الْعَمَلِ إِلَّا بِصَالِحِ النِّيَّةِ
enWisdom: Righteous action is not complete except with righteous intention
